name: leap-lms-monorepo
description: Complete LMS Platform with NestJS Backend and Next.js Frontend

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_execpath && !process.env.npm_execpath.includes('npm')) { console.error('ERROR: This project uses npm. Please use npm install'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require.resolve('turbo'); } catch(e) { console.log('Installing turbo...'); require('child_process').execSync('npm install turbo@^2.3.3 --save-dev', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.clean: npx turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules .turbo
scripts.clean:all: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'tsconfig.tsbuildinfo' -delete && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -rf package-lock.json
